info.title: LinkedIn Job Search API
info.description: High quality job listings from LinkedIn with over 20,000 jobs indexed every hour. Contains jobs from the last 7 days with over 2 million jobs every week. Includes full job description, company industry, followers, location, specialties, and company description. Wide range of filters available: Job Title, Description, Location, Company, Remote. 10M+ AI-enriched LinkedIn jobs every month with Apply URL and hourly refresh. Returns up to 100 jobs per API call.

get.summary: Get LinkedIn jobs from last 7 days
get.description: Returns LinkedIn job listings from the last 7 days. Supports extensive filtering options including title, location, description, company, remote status, industry, seniority, and AI-enriched fields. Returns up to 100 jobs per request with pagination support via offset parameter.

parameters.name: title_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job title. Supports Google-like syntax: 'Software' (contains), 'Software Engineer' (AND), '"Software Engineer"' (exact phrase), 'Software OR Engineer' (OR), '-"Software Engineer"' (exclude)

parameters.name: advanced_title_filter
parameters.description: Advanced title filter with operators: & (AND), | (OR), ! (NOT), <-> (FOLLOWED BY), :* (prefix wildcard). Example: '(AI | "Machine Learning") & ! Marketing'. Cannot be used with regular title_filter

parameters.name: location_filter
parameters.description: Filter by location. Use full names (not abbreviations). Example: '"United States" OR "United Kingdom"'. For US states use full names like "New York"

parameters.name: description_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job description keywords. Same syntax as title_filter. Warning: Risk of timeouts with 7-day endpoint, recommended for 24h endpoint

parameters.name: organization_slug_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company slug(s). Comma-delimited without spaces. Example: 'microsoft,tesla-motors'. Exact matches only

parameters.name: organization_description_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company LinkedIn description. Same syntax as title_filter

parameters.name: organization_specialties_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company LinkedIn specialties. Same syntax as title_filter

parameters.name: type_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job type. Options: CONTRACTOR, FULL_TIME, INTERN, OTHER, PART_TIME, TEMPORARY, VOLUNTEER. Comma-delimited for multiple: 'FULL_TIME,PART_TIME'

parameters.name: industry_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company LinkedIn industry. Case sensitive. Comma-delimited for multiple. Example: 'Accounting,Staffing and Recruiting'. Double-quote industries with commas

parameters.name: seniority_filter
parameters.description: Filter by seniority level. Case sensitive. Options: Associate, Director, Executive, Mid-Senior level, Entry level, Not Applicable, Internship. Comma-delimited: 'Mid-Senior level,Entry level'

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Set to true for remote jobs only, false for non-remote only. Leave empty for both

parameters.name: agency
parameters.description: Filter recruitment agencies: true = only agencies/job boards, false = only regular companies

parameters.name: directapply
parameters.description: Set to true for jobs with LinkedIn EasyApply, false to exclude. Opposite of external_apply_url

parameters.name: external_apply_url
parameters.description: Set to true to include only jobs with external apply URL. Opposite of directapply

parameters.name: employees_gte
parameters.description: Filter companies with employees greater than or equal to this number. Example: 1

parameters.name: employees_lte
parameters.description: Filter companies with employees less than or equal to this number. Example: 200

parameters.name: date_filter
parameters.description: Filter jobs posted after this date. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS' (UTC). Example: '2025-01-01'

parameters.name: description_type
parameters.description: Include job description in output. Set to 'text' for plain text version with /n breaks

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of jobs to return per request. Default and maximum is 100

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset. Multiple of limit parameter. Example: 0, 10, 20 for limit=10

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of results. Default is date descending. Set to 'asc' for ascending

parameters.name: exclude_ats_duplicate
parameters.description: Set to true to remove duplicate jobs between this API and 'Active Jobs DB' API. Only use if you use both APIs

parameters.name: include_ai
parameters.description: BETA: Set to true to include AI-enriched fields (salary, benefits, experience level, detailed remote filters). Only for non-agency jobs

parameters.name: ai_work_arrangement_filter
parameters.description: BETA: Filter by work arrangement. Options: On-site, Hybrid, Remote OK, Remote Solely. Comma-delimited: 'Hybrid,Remote OK'

parameters.name: ai_taxonomies_a_filter
parameters.description: BETA: Filter by top-level taxonomies. Example: 'Technology,Healthcare'. Options include: Technology, Healthcare, Management & Leadership, Finance & Accounting, etc.

parameters.name: ai_taxonomies_a_exclusion_filter
parameters.description: BETA: Exclude jobs with certain taxonomies. Comma-delimited: 'Technology,Healthcare'

parameters.name: ai_has_salary
parameters.description: BETA: Set to true to include only jobs with salary information. Requires include_ai=true

parameters.name: ai_experience_level_filter
parameters.description: BETA: Filter by experience level. Options: 0-2, 2-5, 5-10, 10+. Comma-delimited: '0-2,2-5'

parameters.name: ai_visa_sponsorship_filter
parameters.description: BETA: Set to true to filter jobs that mention visa sponsorship

get.summary: Get LinkedIn jobs from last 24 hours
get.description: Returns LinkedIn job listings indexed during the last 24 hours. Supports all filtering options available in the 7-day endpoint. Better performance for description_filter compared to 7-day endpoint. Returns up to 100 jobs per request.

parameters.name: title_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job title. Supports Google-like syntax

parameters.name: advanced_title_filter
parameters.description: Advanced title filter with operators

parameters.name: location_filter
parameters.description: Filter by location

parameters.name: description_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job description keywords

parameters.name: organization_slug_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company slug(s)

parameters.name: type_filter
parameters.description: Filter by job type

parameters.name: industry_filter
parameters.description: Filter by company industry

parameters.name: seniority_filter
parameters.description: Filter by seniority level

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Filter remote jobs

parameters.name: agency
parameters.description: Filter recruitment agencies

parameters.name: directapply
parameters.description: Filter EasyApply jobs

parameters.name: external_apply_url
parameters.description: Filter jobs with external apply URL

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of jobs per request (max 100)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset

parameters.name: include_ai
parameters.description: Include AI-enriched fields
